p:
Licensed versions of several direct-acting antiviral drugs with anti-HCV activity (including sofosbuvir, daclatasvir, sofosbuvir–ledipasvir, and sofosbuvir–velpatasvir) are available in India, and the price for a course of 3–6 months at the Government's expense is about $1 a day. A modelling study showed that treatment of HCV infection using generic direct-acting antiviral drugs is cost-saving.
402 Provision of HBV oral drugs through the National Viral Hepatitis Control Program is currently in the planning stage.
